effect.black_white: If the user faints before its next move, the Pokémon that fainted it will automatically faint. End-of-turn damage is ignored. This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.
effect.black_2_white_2: If the user faints before its next move, the Pokémon that fainted it will automatically faint. End-of-turn damage is ignored. This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.

short_effect.black_white: If the user faints this turn, the target automatically will, too.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: If the user faints this turn, the target automatically will, too.

flavor_text.black_white: When this move is used, if the user faints, the Pokémon that landed the knockout hit also faints.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: When this move is used, if the user faints, the Pokémon that landed the knockout hit also faints.
